required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Do Patients With Chronic Daily Headache Have Continuous Headache or Moments of Headache Relief?
clinical_study.official_title: Do Patients With Chronic Daily Headache Have Continuous Headache or Moments of Headache Relief?

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of this study is to determine if patients with chronic daily headache have continuous headache or moments of headache relief. The secondary objective of this study is to determine the period of time patients who have chronic daily headache that is not continuous are headache free.

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a retrospective chart review of all patients over the age of 18 who are seen by the co-investigator during one initial, or routine follow up visit, with the diagnosis of chronic migraine, chronic tension type headache, new daily persistent headache, or chronic post traumatic headache(per International Headache Classification II guidelines6). Patients with the above diagnosis during their routine care are asked five standard questions about their headaches by the co-investigator, and the responses are recorded in the patient's medical record (see question sheet attached). These questions pertain to the patients' health care, and are asked of most patients at the Jefferson Headache center with chronic headache routinely during office visits.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Subjects With Daily Headache Who Have Continuous Headache
primary_outcome.time_frame: Records were reviewed from April 2009 through June 2009
primary_outcome.description: The number of subjects with Daily Headache who have continuous headache

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patient With Daily Headache Who Have Non-continuous Headache
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Records were reviewed from April 2009 through June 2009
secondary_outcome.description: Number of patient with Daily Headache who have non-continuous headache

study_pop.textblock: Headache clinic patients with diagnosis of Chronic Migraine, New Daily Persistent Headache, Chronic Tension type headache, or chronic post traumatic headache, over age 18.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients with Chronic Migraine, New Daily Persistent Headache, Chronic Tension type headache, or chronic post traumatic headache seen at the Jefferson Headache Center.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects under age 18.

group.title: Headache Every Day (HED) Non-continuous
group.description: Subjects with Headche every day included those with a diagnosis of Chronic Migraine, New Daily Persistent Headache, Chronic Post Traumatic Headache and Chronic TensionType Headache

group.description: Subjects with Headache every day included those with a diagnosis of Chronic Migraine, New Daily Persistent Headache, Chronic Post Traumatic Headache and Chronic TensionType Headache

certain_agreements.pi_employee: All Principal Investigators ARE employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
